name: Lights For Leo
description:
Available on the IOS Store

Available on Google Play Store

Lights for Leo is two small games in one:

- Word Magic, a word tracing game

- Object Hunt, a "hidden" object game where the purpose is to identify objects in the scene.

Object Hunt is fully voiced and will take the name of the player from the settings (which is also voiced provided it is one of the most common names from this list: https://www.babycenter.com/baby-names/most-popular/top-baby-names-2019

There is no score or timer, the only objective is learning while interacting :)

This game was made to help my 9 year old non-verbal child communicate (or at least work towards that). While it has yet to grab his attention or engage him significantly, I hope maybe it will be good for others as well :)

The game is designed for a touch screen but will work with a mouse as well.

Browser version coming soon, there's some issues currently (Crashes unexpectedly) that need to be worked out :)  This is now fixed, browser version is playable! :)
